item.title: I Am Future coming to PS5, Xbox Series, and Switch on January 8, 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Development team to announce new game on December 9.

Publisher tinyBuild and developer Mandragora will release cozy, single-player, post-apocalyptic survival simulation game I Am Future for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and Switch on January 8, 2026 for $19.99, the companies announced.

Additionally, tinyBuild and Mandragora will unveil a new game from the I Am Future team during Wholesome Snack: The Game Awards 2025 Edition on December 9.

I Am Future first launched in Early Access for PC via Steam on August 8, 2023, followed by a full release on November 13, 2024.

Here is an overview of the console release, via tinyBuild:

About

Console players will soon have the opportunity to build their own rooftop camp and relax in the aftermath of a catastrophic flood. Farming, fishing, exploring, crafting, cookingâ€”what remains of the world is your oyster in I Am Future!

Console players will be able to enjoy all the content that was added to I Am Future throughout its journey on PC, from the initial debut in Steam Early Access in 2023 to the 1.0 launch in late 2024. These include a robust Story Mode, expanded base-building options, a complex weather system, relationship-building with other survivors, and much more. If games like Stardew Valley, DAVE THE DIVER, and Coral Island are up your alley, youâ€™ll feel right at home in I Am Future!

Key Features

  • Build the Cozy Rooftop Base of Your Dreams â€“ Starting from scratch on an abandoned rooftop, youâ€™ll build, decorate and expand the coziest camp ever! Unlock new buildings and furniture, set up electrical grids, and neatly organize your new life.
  • Relax in the Post-Apocalypse â€“ You are the last survivor on Earth, fresh from the sweet, long cryogenic sleep. Itâ€™s finally time to chill out and stop worrying about your job and inflation! Relax, build, wander aroundâ€”the world is literally yours!
  • Tend to Your Beautiful Farm â€“ Nature is healing! Set up a farm, grow fruit, vegetables, and trees, and take care of your crops!
  • Scavenge for Old-World Relics and Craft Gadgets â€“ Find ancient artifacts from a bygone era, like kettles, TVs, and microwaves, then take them apart with a satisfying dismantling system to gather resources for your next crafting project!
  • Hire a Team of Cute Robot Minions â€“ Automate chores around the camp with the help of cute robots! Build a team of AI assistants, issue commands, and manage their workload. And when theyâ€™re doneâ€”let them chill in a charging bath!
  • Explore a Mysterious World â€“ Send out scouting drones on expeditions across the sunken megapolis. Discover new locations, bring something valuable back to base, and uncover the mystery behind the end of the world step by step.
  • Make New Wonderful Friends â€“ The fact that youâ€™re the last human on Earth doesnâ€™t mean you canâ€™t still make new friends! Meet quirky robot inhabitants of this new world, like Earl the Fridge or Bombshell Barbara, and grow your bond with them.
  • Protect Your Base From Pesky Pests â€“ Your camp needs love and protection. Keep pesky mutant pests from destroying the crops or the electrical grid!

item.title: Incantation for PS5, Xbox Series, and Switch launches in March 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Xbox Series demo now available.

The PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and Switch versions of horror adventure game Incantation will launch in March 2026, publisher eastasiasoft and developer Softstar Entertainment announced. A demo is available now for Xbox Series via Microsoft Store as part of Indie Selects Demo Fest.

Incantation first launched for PC via Steam on November 17, 2024.

As previously announced, eastasiasoft will also release physical editions of Incantation for PlayStation 5 and Switch. Pre-orders are available via Play-Asia. The standard edition will be available for both platforms for $29.99. The limited edition will only be available for Switch for $39.99, and includes the game, manual, acrylic standees, Joy-Con stickers, mini case, a lucky charm, and a numbered certificate in a collectorâ€™s box.

Here is an overview of the game, via eastasiasoft:

About

Brave the darkness to find a lost loved one!

Immerse yourself in the chilling tale of the Chen Family Village, where a mother searching for her missing daughter accidentally stumbles into a haunted place filled with mysterious cults. Guide Jia Jun Lee as she searches a village and pieces together fragile clues to her loved oneâ€™s whereabouts, carefully hiding her movements as supernatural threats close in from all sides.

Incantation is a first-person horror-themed adventure game adapted from the live action film of the same name. Beyond the palpable madness and fear in the village, thereâ€™s a sinister force that drives one to despair. What happens when one crosses the forbidden line of this evil deity?

Perform rituals, solve puzzles, collect documents and hunt for key items to access new areas of the village, all in hopes of finding your missing daughter and escaping alive!

Key Features

  • Explore a village filled with dark family secrets and malicious spirits!
  • Search for clues to your missing daughterâ€™s whereabouts while evading your pursuers.
  • Use hiding spots and perform rituals to protect yourself from supernatural threats!
  • Solve environmental puzzles and collect key items to gain access to new areas.
  • Enjoy an immersive cinematic experience inspired by Taiwanese culture and traditions!
